page.title: 11White Notley School (2)
page.content: There is a big lime tree in the school grounds which is a feature of the grounds. {The school seems to be getting {bigger}but does not have it's own hall or kitchen and still has outside toilets. When children leave the school they transfer to Notley High School. At the end of the Summer Term 1985 the school Deputy Headteacher, Mrs. Auriel Newbury is leaving to become the Headteacher at the nearby school at Terling. The oldest children have just been on their first school journey abroad; they went to{Belgium, France, and {Holland}and had a very enjoyable time. The school has a school uniform which is really red or grey jumpers with grey trousers or skirts. DEYOJNE04920180
